attributes.action: Consider introducing and making 'Touch Typing' compulsory in all primary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nearly all pupil's in secondary schools are expected to learn ICT & computor skills. Much time is spent by puils who do not know how to type correctly using old fashioned 'Touch Typing' skills. How many people (young & old) today, struggle to input information on to computers, just using 2 fingers & hesitating between each letter. Their education would greatly benifit from learning to 'Touch Type', saving them a great deal of time during their education and ensuring that as adults they are more efficient.
